cobblemon.species.butterfree_coterian.de: Butterfree of Cotere are a lot stronger and arrogant than their Kantonian counterpart. Their wing dust creates a highly inflamable toxin, that immediately catches fire when Butterfree violently flaps with its wings. They are very territorial and believe that they are high nobility.
cobblemon.species.pikachu_coterian.desc: Pikachu with a fluffy coat of fur are far older than the modern Kantonian specimen, that is known and loved by everyone today. They have adapted to a colder climate with no predators. The use of electric powers is not mandatory to them.
cobblemon.species.raichu_coterian.desc: This form of Raichu is with a high probability the ancestor to both its Kantonian and Alolan variant. Unlike its successors generating electricity is not easy, but they have a different trick up their sleeve: They wait for stormy weather, attract lightning with their long tails and store the electricity of that lightning in their fluffy wool-like fur.
cobblemon.species.hoppiny.name: Hoppiny
cobblemon.species.hoppiny.desc: At a young age, a Hoppiny will steal an egg from a nest for it to paint, it is believed this painted egg stays with it forever.
cobblemon.species.hoppsey.name: Hoppsey
cobblemon.species.hoppsey.desc: Hoppsey spend most of their time running around and fighting unnecessarily, this can often lead to them being viewed as destructive.
cobblemon.species.hoplissey.name: Hoplissey
cobblemon.species.hoplissey.desc: Hoplissey are strong and fearless, using their immense strength to protect their perfectly painted egg.
cobblemon.species.inklett.name: Inklett
cobblemon.species.inklett.desc: This Pokémon may resemble a Diglett, but is something completely else. Its body is very soft, almost liquid, making it hard to move around. To protect itself it created a glass-like exoskeleton around it self made of psychic energy. The cute little feather on its head acts as a radar to detect magic in the air, which it wholeheartedly loves to consume.
cobblemon.species.inktrio.name: Inktrio
cobblemon.species.inktrio.desc: After having mastered dark magic, Inktrio bound itself to an old magic book along with 2 copies of itself. The one with the feather is the original Inklett leading this group. They can often be found in old libraries looking for ancient tomes to feast upon. Knowledge is their favorite food. The older that knowledge is, the tastier it gets.
cobblemon.species.tadborb.name: Tadborb
cobblemon.species.tadborb.desc: These Pokémon often get mistaken for a Tadbulb of the Paldea region, due to their similarly round and yellow shaped small bodies. Tadborb are born very hungry and aren't picky with their food. If it fits in its mouth, it will eat it! Despite their gluttonous nature, Tadborb make great first Pokémon for new and unexperienced trainers.
cobblemon.species.belliborb.name: Belliborb
cobblemon.species.belliborb.desc: Even if Tadborb is a pretty common Pokémon in Cotere, Belliborb are rarely seen in the wild. They are very protective over their young and care a lot about their nutrition. Belliborb has a great sense of smell. When it smells something very delicious, it will even begin to float towards the source! Belliborb has no other motivation to fly but tasty food.
cobblemon.species.mareep_coterian.desc: A lot calmer than the Johtonian Mareep. This variant does not generate electricity, but instead has wool of high quality and durability, that often falls out due to its weight, making it easier for farmers to shear them.
cobblemon.species.flaaffy_coterian.desc: Coterian Flaaffy's fur is very durable. Because of its high quality, it is often used to make winter clothes in Cotere. Flaaffy are very valued in this region during cold seasons.
cobblemon.species.ampharos_coterian.desc: These Ampharos grew mighty horns that are hard as steel, that help them fend off against predators. There is always at least one of them per group. They act as a leader for the Flaaffy and Mareep and will ward off any threat to them. Sometimes they get a bit overprotective over their flock and falsely interpret a something safe as danger.
cobblemon.species.scorbunny_coterian.des: This is a rare sub-specimen of the Galarian Scorbunny. They produce not heat, but static energy on the balms of their feet when running. Despite having a big fable for pranks involving their electric abilities, they are still very empathetic and smart.
cobblemon.species.raboot_coterian.desc: Raboot has lost all of its energy it had as a Scorbunny and looks tired all the time. If they don't have to, they won't move, dozing around and napping all day long. It seems like its storing energy for its evolution. They nocturnal though and can often be seen looking at stars. Cinderace is its great idol.
cobblemon.species.cinderace_coterian.des: Cinderace has mastered its control over electricity. With rapid movements and accurate attacks it makes sure to always land a hit on its target, no matter the distance. It's able to feel the ki of its enemies and use that advantage against them. This way Cinderace is always able to predict its opponent's next move and prepare the counterplay.
cobblemon.species.falinks_coterian.desc: There is a story surrounding this strange Pokémon, that they once got taken over by a colony of poisonous mushrooms, that brainwashed them and made them their puppets. This variant of Falinks uses weapons made from a special ivy plant, which they use to spread its toxins on their foes, weakening them enough to deal the finishing blow.
cobblemon.species.sinistea_coterian.desc: In the Cotere Region Sinistea are always seen as pleasant guest due to its caring nature and lovely smell. It is believed that the hospitality it was shown allowed it to become this exceedingly rare variant. When heated up, these Pokémon emit a fantastic aroma.
cobblemon.species.polteageist_coterian.d: The occa berries it consumed allowed it to evolve into this variant of Polteageist. On the outside they all seem to look the same, but if you look closer to their beverage's consistence, smell and color, you can notice a great difference. Very rarely a Polteageist has been roasted with occa berries of extremely high quality, whichs aroma is said to be heavenly. Cocoa lovers all over the world would fight just to find a so-called 'premium roast' form.
cobblemon.species.woofloo.name: Woofloo
cobblemon.species.woofloo.desc: These Pokémon from the Cotere Region may resemble Wooloo, but at close inspection they turn out to be something totally unrelated. Woofloo hide amongst groups of Wooloo to stay unnoticed. The Wooloo themselves don't seem to mind them at all and even accept them as one of them. When the herd of a Wooloo is in danger, they will do anything to protect the herd, despite being of corwardly nature.
cobblemon.species.dubfool.name: Dubfool
cobblemon.species.dubfool.desc: Dubfool are masters of disguise and pretend to be Dubwool in a herd of Wooloo. If an unsuspecting predator tries to steal one of the Wooloo, the Dubfool in the herd will protect every single Wooloo they can. Many used to believe Dubfool hid amonst Wooloo to prey upon them, but the contrary is here the case.
cobblemon.species.numel_coterian.desc: Similar to Vulpix in the Alola Region and Darumaka in the Galar Region, Numel have adapted to the colder climate of the Cotere Region and gave up their Fire typing for Ice. In small groups these Pokémon wander mountain peaks covered with snow, untouched by any humans and far away from any predators, that wouldn't withstand the harsh climate that they call home.
cobblemon.species.alpineca.name: Alpineca
cobblemon.species.alpineca.desc: In herds this special evolution of Numel wander the snow-covered peaks of the Cotere Region. Far away from any predators, these Pokémon live a peaceful life and get along with the other mountain dwellers very well. If you ever dare to provoke one of these gentle giants, be prepared to get buried in snow and slush!
cobblemon.species.ralts_altered.desc: These Ralts have the appearance of a lost soul. They come out at night and will roam around. If it's seen by a human, it will run away an watch them from afar.
cobblemon.species.kirlia_altered.desc: Being able to read the feelings or other living beings, these Kirlia will dance to try and cheer up those it sees as sad, no matter if they are human or Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir_altered.desc: These Gardevoir are able to connect to the souls of those who has passed away. It takes in any lost souls it can find and will try help them move to the afterlife. If one of it's loved ones were to die, it will contiune to guard and protect their soul, even at the cost of it's own life.
cobblemon.species.gallade_altered.desc: Using their own soul as power, this Pokemon covers it's body in ice and uses it for attacks. The more power it uses, the colder the ice on it's body becomes. As long as they have the energy, they will fight to protect those they care about.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir_altered-mega: Through Mega Evolution, this Pokemon's connection with the afterlife get's even stronger. They're able to see the memories of the souls it guards and will give those souls a breif chance to say goodbye to their loved ones. If the Gardevoir has a strong enough connetion with a soul, it will be able to create of manifestation of them.
cobblemon.species.gallade_altered-mega.d: Upon Mega Evolving, this Pokemon is able to draw out more power it could before, using that power and its ice to repair and fortify it's body. It's able to directly attack ones soul and will go out of it's way to hunt and attack those whose souls have been corrupted in some way.
cobblemon.species.eevee_altered_a.desc: A recently discovered Altered Variant of Eevee. It shares a lot of similarities with the original to the point it's only known difference is it's appearance and stats. It is unknown if it's evolutions are the same or if it even has any to begin with.
cobblemon.species.eevee_altered_b.desc: A recently discovered Altered Variant of Eevee. Due to it being confused with a regular Eevee when discovered, it's true capabilities and possible evolutions are still being researched.
cobblemon.species.umbreon_altered.desc: A newly discovered Altered Form of Umbreon. This Pokemon draws it's power from the light around it. When it becomes night, the markings on it will glow, drawing in more power from the Moon and stars. While the origin of the mist around it is currently unknown, it suppcted to be direct stardust from stars that have died.
cobblemon.species.espeon_altered.desc: A newly discovered Altered Form of Espeon. This Pokemon flames burn with immense power and psychic pressure. It gains power from direct sunlight and it's flames and psychic abilities grow more intense from it. Despite this, it's currently believed to contain an energy far greater than our Sun.
advancements.cobblemon.moon_veevee.descr: Find and catch Altered Eevee A.
advancements.cobblemon.sun_veevee.descri: Find and catch Altered Eevee B.
cobblemon.species.glownine.name: Glownine
cobblemon.species.glownine.desc: this pokemon is immortalized for bringing light to people in dark times. it is theorized to be extinct since it was last spotted 20 years ago
cobblemon.species.gengather.name: Gengather
cobblemon.species.gengather.desc: gengather are known to steal so these pokemon are often blamed fro things going missing. gengather often compare their hoards in duels, the winner is rewarded by the loser
cobblemon.species.sculking.name: Sculking
cobblemon.species.sculking.desc: this pokemon roams around ancient cities. scientists believe they were made to protect the cities from invaders
cobblemon.species.dibink.name: Dibink
cobblemon.species.dibink.desc1: Many trainers take their carbinks deep underground to be near diamonds in hopes to evolve them into the pokemon of myth, however, they only end up looking like the brighter blue diamonds of the mines.
cobblemon.species.coalbink.name: Coalbink
cobblemon.species.emebink.name: Emebink
cobblemon.species.golbink.name: Golbink
cobblemon.species.irbink.name: Irbink
cobblemon.species.rubink.name: Rubink
cobblemon.species.labink.name: Labink
cobblemon.species.coppink.name: Coppink
cobblemon.species.netherbink.name: Netherbink
cobblemon.species.amebink.name: Amebink
cobblemon.species.quarbink.name: Quarbink
cobblemon.species.beta.name: Beta
cobblemon.species.beta.desc1: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.
cobblemon.species.beta.desc2: It is said to have emerged from an egg in a place where there was nothing, then shaped the world.
cobblemon.species.arctosyrin.name: Arctosyrin
cobblemon.species.arctosyrin.desc1: Arctosyrin love to spend their time amoung the herds of wild Lapras, Perhaps this is a behavior they showed in ancient times.
cobblemon.species.sneaselhc.name: Sneasel Dreadful Claw
cobblemon.species.sneaselhc.desc1: A lone Sneasel who never found a Razor Claw, increased his strength so he could survive on his own.
cobblemon.species.golurkgear.name: Golur Gear Guardian
cobblemon.species.golurkgear.desc1: The union of ancient art and the power of machinery, an automaton that unites the knowledge of generations.
cobblemon.species.greatestbull.name: Greatestbull
cobblemon.species.greatestbull.desc1: Prefers to intimidate enemies rather than fight, but will always fight to protect his herd.
cobblemon.species.highyena.name: Highyena
cobblemon.species.highyena.desc1: She leads her pack with great intelligence, her malicious laugh can be heard miles away.
cobblemon.species.golisopodronin.name: Golisopod Fallen Ronin
cobblemon.species.golisopodronin.desc1: A Golisopod that fights to the end, much more aggressive, loves to hunt Grapploct.
cobblemon.species.sunglarer.name: Sunglarer
cobblemon.species.sunglarer.desc1: It constantly refills its pot with fertile soil, allowing it to travel to places difficult for other grass-type Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.electivireraijin.name: Electivire Raijin
cobblemon.species.electivireraijin.desc1: He channeled his excess energy and anger into the arts of theater and dance, which he applied in combat to deliver hard hits.
cobblemon.species.magmortarfurnance.name: Magmortar Eternal Forge
cobblemon.species.magmortarfurnance.desc: The assistant of the ancient master blacksmiths, his steel armor is forged from the metal dust of ancient forges.
cobblemon.species.dusknoirtesla.name: Dusknoir Tesla
cobblemon.species.dusknoirtesla.desc1: The power of the electromagnetic waves it receives from the other world makes it highly unstable and dangerous.
cobblemon.species.salangster.name: Salangster
cobblemon.species.salangster.desc1: Lives in the dark alleys of the cities, where gangs formed with the Salandit, with them dominate the city
cobblemon.species.scolipedewarmount.name: Scolipede War Mount
cobblemon.species.scolipedewarmount.desc: The dust of the various metals in the caves adheres to its body, limiting its use of poison but giving it great defense. Due of its speed and defense, it was a great war mount in ancient times.
cobblemon.species.lanturnkullat.name: Lanturn Kullat
cobblemon.species.lanturnkullat.desc1: Known as the brightest star on the deep ocean, it leads constellations along with other Lanturns.
cobblemon.species.aipom_qlovean.desc: Cobblemon like Mankey and Primeape like to bully Aipom for its odd coloration. By mimicking other apes Qlovean Aipom have evolved to avert their attention to other Aipom.
cobblemon.species.ambipom_qlovean.desc: Sometimes a Qlovean Aipom starts protecting other Aipom. They take up a habit of fighting. These eventually evolve into Qlovean Ambipon.
cobblemon.species.feebas_qlovean.desc: Due to heavy storms these Feebas were pushed into colder areas of the Qlovean Wilds, where they learned to adapt to the colder waters.
cobblemon.species.hoothoot_qlovean.desc: Qlovean Hoothoot have grown thicker eyelashes and eyebrows to stop falling snow from getting in their eyes as they navigate the snowy landscape.
cobblemon.species.milotic_qlovean.desc: Qlovean Milotic are very rare and their scales are extremely valuable. Villagers find their scales the ultimate gift of friendship.
cobblemon.species.noctowl_qlovean.desc: Due to the heavy snow storms in the Qlovean Wilds, Qlovean Noctowl has adapted to have a more sleek design to conquer the heavy winds.
cobblemon.species.veluza_qlovean.desc: These Veluza have adapted to the Lush Oceans of the Qlovean Wilds. Blending in seemlesly with its surroundings, making it the ultimate underwater predator.
cobblemon.species.wooper_qlovean.desc: Qlovean Wooper come to exist when a normal wooper after drowning. This often happpens when they get stuck under a lily pad. They love to partner up with Mimikyu.
cobblemon.species.quagsire_qlovean.desc: Skilled hunters of the night, they love to sink boats traveling through swamps taking their victims under to make them feel how they felt as young Woopers.
cobblemon.species.torkoal_qlovean.desc: Due to slow movement coral started to grow from the Torkoals shell, fusing with it to become one entity. The Torkoal now uses these corals to absorb minerals from the surrounding environment
cobblemon.species.foongus_qlovean.desc: This Cobblemon resembles a love ball, but unlike it's normal variant it doesn't do this to lure people in, but to show it is harmless and make new friends.
cobblemon.species.amoonguss_qlovean.desc: Qlovean Amoonguss is a highly social creature. They often do get high on their own supply.
cobblemon.species.murkrow_qlovean.desc: Some Murkrow are born with a rare pigment mutation which leaves them completely white. Due to their colouring they often fall prey to predators or die early in development due to issues with their feathers.
cobblemon.species.honchkrow_qlovean.desc: Qlovean Hunchkrow comes to exist when Qlovean Murkrow refuses to die and actually grows up unlike many of its kind.
cobblemon.species.chikorita_jetian.desc: This strange form of Chikorita is very affectionate, it often times can be seen letting smaller pokemon sleep on their round stomachs.
cobblemon.species.bayleef_jetian.desc: Large and caring, these rare Bayleef protect small pokemon and use special chemicals to make any predators cry
cobblemon.species.meganium_jetian.desc: The kindest of all creatures, these Meganium create pathways for pokemon to safely travel. There was once a legend of a Jetian Meganium so big that a city was built on its back
cobblemon.species.vegonk.name: Vegonk
cobblemon.species.squashologne.name: Squashologne
cobblemon.species.vegonk.desc: These small grass types resemble the Paldean pokemon Lechonk, however, they are actually entirely plant matter!
cobblemon.species.squashologne.desc: Bigger and stronger, squashologne move from field to field, where they settle a pumpkin patch is formed.
cobblemon.species.tepig_jetian.desc: These small pigs run around and collect mushrooms in the ground, once found, these mushrooms are given to their closest friend
cobblemon.species.pignite_jetian.desc: Having grown in size, these special Pignite now fight to protect any of their friends, throwing dirt and mushrooms at the opponent's eyes
cobblemon.species.emboar_jetian.desc: These pokemon leave large footprints through the mud they examine for mushrooms, the sweet scents from its fur cause mushrooms to naturally want to grow
cobblemon.species.cherubi_jetian.desc: These pokemon can often times be seen throwing themselves at trainers, mainly out of spite
cobblemon.species.cherrim_jetian.desc: These cherrim launch themselves at enemies, aiming for their eyes for optimal damage. Some even make it a competition
cobblemon.species.fomantis_jetian.desc: These pokemon sleep in the soil, their bodies release a toxin as they do so, which may damage nearby crops
cobblemon.species.lurantis_jetian.desc: These lurantis settle in forests, slowly leaching off their life force
cobblemon.species.squirtle_jetian.desc: This Squirtle has adapted to survive amongst the tea leaves of Jetia
cobblemon.species.wartortle_jetian.desc: This Wartortle is often used at tea houses and spas throughout Jetia
cobblemon.species.blastoise_jetian.desc: Blastoise in Jetia mainly use their cannons to pour a delightfully sweet tea that calms pokemon when consumed
cobblemon.species.lapras_jetian.desc: These pokemon have only been seen by a small number of people, they describe it as a piece of driftwood haunted by the spirit of a lonely Lapras
cobblemon.species.sableye_jetian.desc: The chemical that emits from these Sableye's skin helps save crops from dehydration, making them a must have for all farmers
cobblemon.species.goldeen_jetian.desc: These Goldeen eat small pieces of gold found on the river floor, causing their scales to become almost golden themselves
cobblemon.species.seaking_jetian.desc: The gold on these Seaking is worth large amounts, making them admirable to poachers, hence the Jetian Water-Type Agency was created
cobblemon.species.dodiwi.name: Dodiwi
cobblemon.species.dodiwi.desc: Dodiwi are a sweet pokemon that will run over to other pokemon and feed them small pieces of cake
cobblemon.species.omnigrub.name: Omnigrub
cobblemon.species.omnigrub.desc: Omnigrub's DNA is so unstable that it can become almost every bug type
cobblemon.species.ultimagrub.name: Ultimagrub
cobblemon.species.ultimagrub.desc: Ultimagrub are the true form of Omnigrub, only able to be achieved by the most determined trainers. Even Arceus fears this creature.
cobblemon.species.doduo_jetian.desc: Jetian Doduo run around the floor picking up seeds and fruit, they bring it to their trainers expecting cake in return
cobblemon.species.dodrio_jetian.desc: Jetian Dodrio have long discussions between each head, many people like to sit and watch them talk to eachother, even if they aren't understandable
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboo_jetian.desc: These Pumpkaboo are the natural predators of Vegonk and Jetian Cherubi, it is said they cook and eat these pokemon, however this is just speculation
cobblemon.species.paraflora.name: Paraflora
cobblemon.species.falegends.name: Falegends
cobblemon.species.paraflora.desc: These pokemon are from ancient times, scientists never found a complete fossil so other fossil's DNA had to be used to make them
cobblemon.species.parasynthesis.name: Parasynthesis
cobblemon.species.parasynthesis.desc: These pokemon used to live in ancient swamps, where they would eat mud to strengthen their digestion
cobblemon.species.rhinostella.name: Rhinostella
cobblemon.species.rhinostella.desc: These strange mammalian pokemon are found in large amber samples, scientists think they originated in the great ice age of Jetia
cobblemon.species.fairhino.name: Fairhino
cobblemon.species.pidgipodgi.name: Pidgipodgi
cobblemon.species.chomppest.name: Chomppest
cobblemon.species.smolcery.name: Smolcery
cobblemon.species.regifurr.name: Regifurr
cobblemon.species.smolcremie.name: Smolcremie
cobblemon.species.rockocroco.name: Rockocroco
cobblemon.species.snowwing.name: Snowwing
cobblemon.species.spirikid.name: Spirikid
cobblemon.species.maguskeg.name: Maguskeg
cobblemon.species.beesilissa.name: Beesilissa
cobblemon.species.pudlphant.name: Pudlphant
cobblemon.species.moldjinn.name: Moldjinn
cobblemon.species.tutel.name: Tutel
cobblemon.species.choncub.name: Choncub
cobblemon.species.pidgipodgi.desc: These cowardly pokemon eat garbage on the street and run away crying when anyone approaches
cobblemon.species.falegends.desc: Years ago, the first Jetian Falinks left its group to be a baker, the group? Rumour has it that they went out searching for a strange pokemon, and were turned to stone. Their souls still searching for adventure.
cobblemon.species.smolcery.desc: This small rabbit pokemon has learned to mimic the Galarian Milcery as to appear more attractive to trainers
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-rubycream.d: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to raspberries, they are often kept by wealthy trainers to brag to others
cobblemon.species.smolcremie.desc: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to cream, they are often kept by parents looking to entertain their children
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-matchacream: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to matcha, they are often kept by bookshop owners to enhance the calming atmosphere of their store
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-mintcream.d: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to mint, they are often kept by dentists to attempt to stop children from being scared
This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to lemon, they are often kept by trainers who love collecting all the pokemon of Jetia
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-saltedcream: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to the ocean, they are often kept by people who miss their time by the ocean and want a sense of nostalgia
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-rubyswirl.d: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to strawberries, they are often kept by rookie trainers looking to start their adventure
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-caramelswir: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to caramel, they are often kept by bakers and restaurants
cobblemon.species.smolcremie-rainbowswir: This pokemon sweats a substance with a similar scent to flowers, they are often kept by influencers and celebrities for their pretty appearance
cobblemon.species.fairhino.desc: These pokemon secrete a nice smell from their horn that can heal injured pokemon
cobblemon.species.bovittle.name: Bovittle
cobblemon.species.maguskeg.desc: These pokemon dance around the world, as they go from town to town, they invite other people and pokemon to join in the dance
cobblemon.species.maguskeg_jetian.desc: These pokemon were influenced by the pollution in Jetia, leading them to be aggressive and hurtful to people and pokemon
cobblemon.species.magikarp_jetian.desc: These Magikarp were influenced by the pollution of Jetia, they swim and jump out the water to attack passerbyers
cobblemon.species.gyarados_jetian.desc: These Gyarados are no longer as large as their Kantonian relatives. They were caught and cooked in restaurants around Jetia, leading them to adapt to appear as if their neck was a bone, making them appear already dead.
cobblemon.species.regifurr.desc: This pokemon is an myth in Jetia, only a few blurry pictures have been properly taken of them.
cobblemon.species.chomppest.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Totodile being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.choncub.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Spheal being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.beesilissa.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Florges being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.tutel.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Shroodle being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.pudlphant.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Drowzee being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.moldjinn.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Elgyem being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.spirikid.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Yamask being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.snowwing.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Darumaka being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.rockocroco.desc: This pokemon exists due to a group of Palafin being trapped in Jetia's ruins and mutating into an entirely new species
cobblemon.species.bovittle.desc: They walk around and eat grass all day, they're quite chubby
cobblemon.species.pupaint.name: Pupaint
cobblemon.species.pupaint.desc: These mischievous little pokemon hate Grafaiai, as they are artistic rivals
cobblemon.species.canvette.name: Canvette
cobblemon.species.canvette.desc: Now masters of the arts, these pokemon are rare but cherished
cobblemon.species.todlbug.name: Todlbug
cobblemon.species.todlbug.desc: They scurry around the forest and jungle floor, they sit there waiting to be stood on so they can use their spikes to attack unsuspecting prey.
cobblemon.species.spectuff.name: Spectuff
cobblemon.species.spectuff.desc: Spectuff release a spicy aroma that affects the brain, sometimes leading to intense fear and horror
cobblemon.species.yamper_jetian.desc: There is a children's tale in Jetia of an old baker who baked a batch of yamper shaped bread, and that she loved her creations so much they were given life
cobblemon.species.boltund_jetian.desc: These Boltund eat salt in the soil and use it to generate enough energy they can run from one bakery to another. This is why they are commonly used to deliver bakery items across Jetia!
cobblemon.species.crawlcadet.name: Crawlcadet
cobblemon.species.armacrawl.name: Armacrawl
cobblemon.species.crawledge.name: Crawledge
cobblemon.species.crawlcadet.desc: These Bug-types have a thick exoskeleton on their head that resembles the helmet of the Paldean Charcadet, they use the spike on this exoskeleton to attack predators
cobblemon.species.armacrawl.desc: The thick exoskeleton on Crawlcadet develops around the man-made armor it holds, causing an even stronger armor to be formed that is suitable for Armacrawl's brutal fighting techniques
cobblemon.species.crawledge.desc: The thick exoskeleton on Crawlcadet becomes more light, encasing the armor only slightly. This allows their body to transfer the majority of their strength to their metallic blades
cobblemon.species.stufful_jetian.desc: These Stufful sit in trees and wait patiently for the Nighttime Harvest Festival
cobblemon.species.bewear_jetian.desc: These Bewear rarely move, staying still for the majority of the day. However, they will always go to the Nighttime Harvest each year, and their appearance has sparked many foods for this celebration
cobblemon.species.nickit_jetian.desc: These Nickit play with the children in Jetia around the time of the Nighttime Harvest, though their magic tricks are weaker, it still makes them laugh
cobblemon.species.thievul_jetian.desc: During the Nighttime Harvest, groups of Thievul will gather and create sparkling blue lights in the sky, resembling a firework
cobblemon.species.regisecto.name: Regisecto
cobblemon.species.regisecto.desc: This pokemon's body is comprised of sentient slime that work together to create a solid shape. They are natural protectors and have been keeping bug types safe for thousands of years
cobblemon.species.falinks_jetian.desc: These Falinks left the rest of their group to enter a career in baking! They gather on the Nighttime Harvest and showcase all their baked goods to trainers
cobblemon.species.lunatone_jetian.desc: These Lunatone were blessed by a legendary so that they can watch over the night for her when she isn't there
cobblemon.species.feebas_jetian.desc: This Feebas is used to Jetia's waters, and the strong light from the Blue-Moon
cobblemon.species.milotic_jetian.desc: Stories say that these Milotic move the light from the moon across the water, as if the moonlight were silk over the lakes and rivers, the ponds and seas. Trainers know that Jetian Milotic only stay with those worthy, and so the Nighttime Harvest holds a dance in honour of them.
advancements.cobblemon.own_vegonk.descri: Catch a strange Lechonk shaped pumpkin
advancements.cobblemon.bakery_mons.descr: Have a Jetian Falinks, and his freshly baked friends (Jetian Dodrio and Jetian Boltund)
advancements.cobblemon.own_ultimagrub.de: Get your Omnibug to lvl 100 and find out what happens when you press 'evolve'
cobblemon.species.tuligant.name: Tuligant
cobblemon.species.tuligant.desc: An alternate evolution of Petilil, and a counterpart of Lilligant. It uses the flower atop its head to absorb moonlight to help it grow. It is said that a Tuligant's petals can revive people from their deathbeds... But at the cost of a terrible curse.
cobblemon.species.papersol.name: Papersol
cobblemon.species.papersol.desc: The parasol on its head protects its paper body from wrinkling in the harsh sunlight. Despite resembling an umbrella this Pokémon is made of paper so it avoids the rain at all costs.
cobblemon.species.umbrelligant.name: Umbrelligant
cobblemon.species.umbrelligant.desc: Using its stilt-like legs, this Pokémon walks across rivers and ponds to keep cool without risk of its paper body touching the water. The parasol on its head protects it from the harsh summer sun.
cobblemon.species.pillowisp.name: Pillowisp
cobblemon.species.pillowisp.desc: When a pillow is inhabited by a wandering spirit laying to rest, it becomes this Pokémon. Its pillowcase body is filled with magic sand that inherits the Pokemon’s dreams. It is said that if you lay your head on this Pokémon’s pillow-like body, you will dream happy dreams.
cobblemon.species.pillowisp_bad.name: Pillowisp
cobblemon.species.pillowisp_bad.desc: When a pillow is inhabited by a wandering spirit laying to rest, it becomes this Pokémon. Its pillowcase body is filled with magic sand that inherits the Pokémon’s dreams. It is said that if you lay your head on this Pokémon’s pillow-like body, you will be tormented by nightmares.
cobblemon.species.slugrit.name: Slugrit
cobblemon.species.slugrit.desc: A convergent evolution that resembles Slugma. Its body is made entirely of sand and rock. It lays flat in the sun to keep itself heated, blending in with the desert terrain.
cobblemon.species.dunecargo.name: Dunecargo
cobblemon.species.dunecargo.desc: A convergent evolution that resembles Magcargo. The large rock shell on its back is full of the sand that makes up its body. It travels with the wind, wandering slowly across the dunes. When confronted, it throws burning hot sand at its foes.
cobblemon.species.dreaneuma.name: Dreaneuma
cobblemon.species.dreaneuma.desc: After being imbued with positive thoughts, this Pokémon has evolved. Under the light of the full moon, it enters into people’s homes to sprinkle its magic sand around their beds. The sand that makes up its body is said to fill people’s dreams with peace and happiness.
cobblemon.species.phantasmare.name: Phantasmare
cobblemon.species.phantasmare.desc: After being imbued with negative thoughts, this Pokémon has evolved. In the darkness of the New Moon, this Pokémon sneaks into people’s bedrooms to sprinkle their beds with its magic sand. The sand that makes up its body induces terrifying nightmares.
cobblemon.species.lucario_y.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.lucario_y.desc: Its fighting style is ruthless and brutal, and it shows its opponents no mercy. Its aura is overflowing, allowing it to sense its opponent's moves before they even make them. When the eyes on its hands open, it launches bursts of aura that can turn steel into dust..
cobblemon.species.ralts_goth.name: Ralts
cobblemon.species.ralts_goth.desc: Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head, and feeds off of the fear of others... Unfortunately, its also a scaredy-cat itself. It will often jump out to scare people, only to get spooked when they scream.
cobblemon.species.kirlia_goth.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.kirlia_goth.desc: It is said that a Kirlia will absorb the negative emotions of its trainer. This Pokémon prefers to keep to itself, picking petals off of flowers and thinking melancholy thoughts.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir_goth.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.gardevoir_goth.desc: It uses its elegant appearance to lure people in, giving them a false sense of security before biting their neck and draining them of their vitality. Despite being known for its vanity, many folktales claim that this Pokémon has no reflection.
cobblemon.species.gallade_goth.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.gallade_goth.desc: This Pokémon has the ability to disappear into shadows. It uses this skill to ambush people and Pokémon, incapacitating them with its blades before draining them of their vitality. People who live near its territory caution to stay away from shady locations.
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboom.name: Pumpkaboom
cobblemon.species.pumpkaboom.desc: Kaboom! This convergent evolution of Pumpkaboo is full of explosive energy. Its internal flame is bursting with heat, and it loves to sneak up on people before frightening them with a huge explosion.
cobblemon.species.gourgrenade.name: Gourgrenade
cobblemon.species.gourgrenade.desc: Gourgrenade is a convergent evolution of Gourgeist. In the dark of night, it awakens from its pumpkin patch searching for unsuspecting victims. When it finds one, it showers pumpkin grenades around them in an attempt to scare them.
cobblemon.species.norstar.name: Norstar
cobblemon.species.norstar.desc: Despite looking like a starfish, it's actually made entirely of magnetic metals. The magnetic pull of the planet allows it to balance perfectly straight on the tip of its bottom leg.
cobblemon.species.starstellation.name: Starstellar
cobblemon.species.starstellation.desc: It uses its six legs to redirect magnetic fields. Some say they are even able to direct the stars with this power.
cobblemon.species.hattertainer.name: Hattertainer
cobblemon.species.hattertainer.desc: It can't stand long periods of silence, so it often goes out of its way to be around others. In an attempt to keep people happy, it likes to put on grand and over-the-top performances to wow the audience. If it senses negative emotions like anger, jealousy, or annoyance, it adopts those emotions and retaliate with a flaming whip.
cobblemon.species.hattrix.name: Hattrix
cobblemon.species.hattrix.desc: Hattrix uses the braids on its head to juggle fireballs. It puts on performances to cheer people up when they're sad, because its sensitive to negative emotion.
cobblemon.species.hatenna_midnight.name: Hatenna
cobblemon.species.hatenna_midnight.desc: This Pokémon is sensitive to human emotions. Because of this, it does everything it can to keep people happy. It uses its hat to perform all sorts of tricks to impress others.
cobblemon.species.goodra-bogland.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.goodra-bogland.desc: To survive in the muddy boglands, Goodra developed more potent toxins within its slime. It lays down in the mud all day long to keep its skin from drying out, and to conserve its energy. Its metabolism is slow but efficient, allowing it survive longer off of less food. This is what gives it its sluggish demeanor.
cobblemon.species.goodra-wetland.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.goodra-wetland.desc: To survive in flooded wetlands, Goodra's body adapted to a more aquatic lifestyle. Its blubber allows it to float on top of the water with ease. It is often seen drifting down river rapids at high speeds, seemingly as a form of play.
cobblemon.species.fomantis_lunar.name: Fomantis
cobblemon.species.fomantis_lunar.desc: Unlike its tropical counterpart, this form of Fomantis is nocturnal. It awakens from its slumber to bask in the full moon's light, using this energy for photosynthesis. The light of the moon strengthens its psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.lurantis_lunar.name: Lurantis
cobblemon.species.lurantis_lunar.desc: This Pokémon uses its orchid-like appearance to blend into its surrounding as it soaks in moonlight. Although it resembles a bug, its actually a flower. It goes into a mantis-like stance and attacks with psychic blades when threatened by bug types drawn to its scent.
cobblemon.move.psyblade.desc: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.
cobblemon.move.supercellslam.desc: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.
cobblemon.move.alluringvoice.desc: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.
cobblemon.species.falinks-last-soldier.d: Even after losing its five troopers in battle, the Last Soldier refuses to retreat. Its fallen comrades continue to fight alongside their leader, empowering them with ghostly aura. This power allows it to face even the strongest armies without faltering.
cobblemon.species.falinks-gunslinger.des: The five individuals stack on top of each other, acting as one. Their towering position allows them to more easily aim and fire with the cannons on their heads, with less risk of friendly fire. The brass on the top of the stack commands the bottom-most trooper and directs them in the direction it wants to go.
cobblemon.species.nosepyre.name: Nosepyre
cobblemon.species.nosepyre.desc: There is a perpetual motion machine within the body of this Pokémon. It is said that as long as the machine keeps moving, the flame on its head will continue to spin. When its flame stops spinning, so does its life.
cobblemon.species.gildenose.name: Gildenose
cobblemon.species.gildenose.desc: The raging fire within this Pokémon has been quenched, granting it an enlightened peace of mind. Gildenose has mastered regeneration, it is said that if you perform an age-old dance of generations, you will be gifted with life-giving flowers.
cobblemon.species.noseferatu.name: Noseferatu
cobblemon.species.noseferatu.desc: After being exposed to the power of amethyst, this Pokémon was imbued with dark energy allowing it to evolve. It uses its crystal pendent to control the floating amethyst around it. These amethyst crystals can fire beams of energy to attack its foes.
cobblemon.species.djinnferno.name: Djinnferno
cobblemon.species.djinnferno.desc: The infinite flames within its stone body have burst out, granting it immense power. Its body is made entirely of spiritual flames, causing its appearance to resemble that of a genie... Some say that its fire can burn away the impurities of the soul, but none who have attempted have survived.
cobblemon.species.regisculk.name: Regisculk
cobblemon.species.regisculk.desc: Its entire body is comprised of Sculk. The Pokémon's origins are a complete mystery, all that is known about it is that it was hidden away in the Ancient Cities long ago. It is unclear if this Pokémon has any connection to Regigigas, or if the resemblence has a more sinister explanation.
cobblemon.species.carbink-amethyst.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.carbink-amethyst.desc: This form of Carbink is born during the formation of underground geodes. When light refracts through its amethyst crystals, its psychic powers awaken.
cobblemon.species.carbink-emerald.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.carbink-emerald.desc: This form of Carbink is born from the high pressure when mountains form. Its emerald-green glow makes it a favorite of the Villagers.
cobblemon.species.carbink-echo.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.carbink-echo.desc: This form of Carbink is only found in the deepest darkest depths of the caves. It is unknown how it came into being... Its body reverberates with sound, said to be echoes of the past.
cobblemon.species.clarissie.name: Clarissie
cobblemon.species.clarissie.desc: By exerting its psychic powers, Clarissie has to power to create amethyst crystals between its hands. It can shoot beams of light through its crystals to amplify their power.
cobblemon.species.beryllius.name: Beryllius
cobblemon.species.beryllius.desc: Beryllius is able to channel the energy of the earth to create emeralds between its hands. Because of this, it sees no value in traditional wealth, rather it gifts its gemstones to young children who better appreciate their splendor.
cobblemon.species.echolyte.name: Echolyte
cobblemon.species.echolyte.desc: This Pokémon is so rarely seen that many scientists debate whether or not its truly alive. The shards that encircle its body protect its soft spirit-like core. Few people have seen it without its outer shell.
cobblemon.species.phantump-pale.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.phantump-pale.desc: The spirit of a deceased Phantump. Its wooden body has long-since petrified, becoming hard as stone. During the day it remains as still as a statue, but at night it stirs from its slumber to wander the pale forest it calls home.
cobblemon.species.trevenant-pale.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.trevenant-pale.desc: In the dark of the night, it lurks through the dead and decaying forest it used to live in when it was alive. It unleashes the forest's rage on those who tarnished its homeland, and brutally attacks any intruders who enter its domain. Its body is made of petrified wood.
cobblemon.species.flabebe-allay.name: Flabébé
cobblemon.species.flabebe-allay.desc: Its body is as light as a feather, letting its wings guide it through wind currents to travel the world. As it flies it hums a beautiful tune.
cobblemon.species.alloette.name: Alloette
cobblemon.species.alloette.desc: It glides through the meadows singing a graceful lullaby. If it hears music, it can't help but be drawn to it and dance around. They say that if you give an Alloette a gift, it will be loyal to you for the rest of its life.
cobblemon.species.tangela-lush.name: Tangela
cobblemon.species.tangela-lush.desc: Thick moss and vines cover its whole body, preventing anyone from seeing its true appearance. It has an intense fear of the dark, but fears showing its face even more. Because of this, it will stubbornly hide in the shadows if anyone approaches, even despite its fear.
cobblemon.species.tanglare.name: Tanglare
cobblemon.species.tanglare.desc: Because its entire body is obscured by moss and vines, scientists are unsure how it propels itself through the air. When threatened, it will shake its body to create a cloud of spores before dissapearing into the shadows.
cobblemon.species.golett-copper.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.golett-copper.desc: Its been alive for thousands of years, recharging its power by standing in lightning storms. If it doesn't stay active enough, it will slowly oxidize over time. The more oxidization it has, the slower it moves.
cobblemon.species.golurk-copper.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.golurk-copper.desc: The mechanism within its body is said to produce never-ending lightning storms. It patrols the ancient chambers from which it was created. The only thing that stops it from its mission is its copper body aging with time. Once its oxidization reaches critical levels, it stops moving.
cobblemon.species.clawviathan.name: Clawviathan
cobblemon.species.clawviathan.desc: Clawviathan lives in the deepest trenches of the ocean, propelling itself through the water by shooting water through its claws. When threatened it blasts its opponent to shreds with draconic energy. Though rare, it has been recorded to sometimes blast holes in the bottom of ships crossing over its territory.
cobblemon.species.spiritube.name: Spiritube
cobblemon.species.spiritube.desc: This Pokémon was born when 108 spirits became trapped within a television broadcast. It remains dormant within its CRT Television, waiting for an unsespecting person to turn on the TV.
cobblemon.species.dhelmise-sculk.name: Dhelmise
cobblemon.species.dhelmise-sculk.desc: When reanimated Sculk wrapped around a large ancient pickaxe this Pokémon was born. The Sculk covering the pickaxe is actually its body, and it uses the tool to dig through the caves looking for unsuspecting individuals lost in the mines. If it finds its prey, it wraps their bodies in Sculk before leeching away their vitality.
cobblemon.move.ivycudgel.desc: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
cobblemon.species.grimer-alola.desc: A Grimer, which had been brought in to solve a problem with garbage, developed over time into this form.
cobblemon.species.muk-alola.desc: While it's unexpectedly quiet and friendly, if it's not fed any trash for a while, it will smash its Trainer's furnishings and eat up the fragments.
cobblemon.species.growlithe-hisui.desc: They patrol their territory in pairs. It is believed the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
cobblemon.species.arcanine-hisui.desc: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
cobblemon.species.avalugg-hisui.desc: The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
cobblemon.species.mrmime-galar.desc: Its talent is tap-dancing. It can also manipulate temperatures to create a floor of ice, which this Pokémon can kick up to use as a barrier.
cobblemon.species.articuno-galar.desc: Its feather-like blades are composed of psychic energy and can shear through thick iron sheets as if they were paper.
cobblemon.species.zapdos-galar.desc: When its feathers rub together, they produce a crackling sound like the zapping of electricity. That's why this Pokémon is called Zapdos.
cobblemon.species.moltres-galar.desc: This Pokémon's sinister, flame-like aura will consume the spirit of any creature it hits. Victims become burned-out shadows of themselves.
cobblemon.species.mimejr-galarbias.desc: It mimics everyone it sees, but it puts extra effort into copying the graceful dance steps of Mr. Rime as practice.
cobblemon.species.darumaka-galar.desc: The colder they get, the more energetic they are. They freeze their breath to make snowballs, using them as ammo for playful snowball fights.
cobblemon.species.darmanitan-galar.desc: Though it has a gentle disposition, it's also very strong. It will quickly freeze the snowball on its head before going for a headbutt.
cobblemon.species.yamask-galar.desc: A clay slab with cursed engravings took possession of a Yamask. The slab is said to be absorbing the Yamask's dark power.
cobblemon.species.corsola-galar.desc: Sudden climate change wiped out this ancient kind of Corsola. This Pokémon absorbs others' life-force through its branches.
cobblemon.species.meowstic-f.desc: Females are a bit more selfish and aggressive than males. If they don't get what they want, they will torment you with their psychic abilities.
cobblemon.species.indeedee-f.desc: It dislikes conflict. If a fight occurs in its territory, it uses psychic power to throw things at the combatants in an effort to drive them away.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-heart.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is made with love.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-star.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is shines like the stars.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-diamond.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by diamond shapes.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-debutante.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by upper-class dresses.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-matron.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by Matrons.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-dandy.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one has a dandy look to it.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-lareine.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one makes it look like a Queen.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-kabuki.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by Kabuki artists.
cobblemon.species.furfrou-pharaoh.desc: There was an era when aristocrats would compete to see who could trim their Furfrou's fur into the most exquisite style. This one is inspired by pharaohs.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-1.desc: This is a single Zygarde cell that has much potential to grow immensily.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-10.desc: This is Zygarde when about 10% of its pieces have been assembled. It leaps at its opponent's chest and sinks its sharp fangs into them.
cobblemon.species.zygarde-complete.desc: Born when all of Zygarde's cells have been gathered together, it uses force to neutralize those who harm the ecosystem.
cobblemon.species.sinistea-antique.desc: This Sinistea lives in an antique teacup. As valuable as this Pokémon is, its awful taste remains unchanged.
cobblemon.species.polteageist-antique.de: Apparently a Polteageist's disposition is affected by the type of tea the Pokémon came from. What teapot it inhabits makes no difference.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-attack.desc: This Deoxys has transformed into its aggressive guise, a tactic to fool enemies by altering its appearance.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-defense.desc: This Deoxys has transformed into its defensive form, a tactic to enemies by altering its appearance.
cobblemon.species.deoxys-speed.desc: This Deoxys has transformed into its fastest form, a tactic to enemies by altering its appearance.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-armored.desc: This Mewtwo was equipt with a durable armor by unknown scientists.
cobblemon.species.kyurem-black.desc: The sameness of Zekrom's and Kyurem's genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Zekrom. Kyurem can now use the power of both electricity and ice.
cobblemon.species.ursaluna-bloodmoon.des: This special Ursaluna crossed the sea and drifted ashore in a new land. It can see in the dark with its left eye and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.
cobblemon.species.arceus-bug.desc: Where all creation was born, that is the being's place of origin.
cobblemon.species.silvally-bug.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to bug type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.zacian-crowned.desc: Able to cut down anything with a single strike, it became known as the Fairy King's Sword, and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.
cobblemon.species.zamazenta-crowned.desc: Its ability to deflect any attack led to it being known as the Fighting Master's Shield. It was feared and respected by all.
cobblemon.species.onix-crystal.desc: An unique kind of Onix made out of glass crystal. It's also unique from other Onix in that it can live in water without being hurt by it.
cobblemon.species.arceus-dark.desc: Two make matter, and three make spirit, shaping the world.
cobblemon.species.silvally-dark.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to dark type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-dragon.desc: Three beings were born to bind time and space.
cobblemon.species.silvally-dragon.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to dragon type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-electric.desc: The third being raged, raining down bolts of anger.
cobblemon.species.silvally-electric.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to electric type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fairy.desc: The Original One is in all things. The Original One is nowhere at all. From all creations, over all creations, does the Original One watch over all.
cobblemon.species.silvally-fairy.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to fairy type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fighting.desc: Three beings whose power can hold both time and space fixed. The rift is born of disorder on the other side of this world.
cobblemon.species.silvally-fighting.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to fighting type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-fire.desc: The power of defeated giants infuses this Plate.
cobblemon.species.silvally-fire.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to fire type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-flying.desc: The being poured the remains of its power into stone and buried it deep.
cobblemon.species.silvally-flying.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to flying type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-grass.desc: The powers of Plates are shared among Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.silvally-grass.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to grass type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ghost.desc: The other side of this world was given by the Original One to its raging third.
cobblemon.species.silvally-ghost.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to ghost type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ground.desc: When the universe was created, its shards became this Plate.
cobblemon.species.silvally-ground.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to ground type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.rotom-heat.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a strange cauldron. The cauldron's origin is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble with the flames it spits.
cobblemon.species.rotom-wash.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within an odd bureau. The bureau's purpose is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by splashing cold water everywhere.
cobblemon.species.rotom-fan.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a mysterious contraption. The contraption's purpose is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by stirring up powerful winds.
cobblemon.species.rotom-frost.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a bizarre cupboard. The cupboard's composition is unknown. A bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by frosting everything over.
cobblemon.species.rotom-mow.desc: A form in which Rotom lurks within a misshapen wheelbarrow. The wheelbarrow's mechanisms are bizarre. It's a bothersome Pokémon, causing trouble by mowing down grass and trees.
cobblemon.species.arceus-ice.desc: Two beings of time and space set free from the Original One.
cobblemon.species.silvally-ice.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to ice type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.calyrex-ice.desc: According to lore, this Pokémon showed no mercy to those who got in its way, yet it would heal its opponents' wounds after battle.
cobblemon.species.toxtricity-lowkey.desc: It has an electrical organ on its chest. While generating electricity, it fills its surroundings with what sounds like the strumming of a bass guitar.
cobblemon.species.rayquaza-mega.desc: Mega Rayquaza was said to have been born from humanity's wish for salvation, channeled through the Key Stone of a Draconid Lorekeeper. It is the first recorded Pokémon to achieve Mega Evolution.
cobblemon.species.lycanroc-midnight.desc: This form of Lycanroc is reckless. It charges headlong at its opponents, attacking without any care about what injuries it might receive.
cobblemon.species.rockruff-dusk.desc: This is an unique kind of Rockruff. It appears capable of undergoing a special kind of evolution.
cobblemon.species.lycanroc-dusk.desc: This form of Lycanroc is normally calm and quiet. Once a battle begins, however, this Pokémon displays a ferocious fighting spirit.
cobblemon.species.dialga-origin.desc: Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.
cobblemon.species.palkia-origin.desc: It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the creator of all things. This imitation of appearance is said to be Palkia's strategy for gaining Arceus's powers.
cobblemon.species.giratina-origin.desc: Giratina loses its legs upon changing into this form. It is believed this Pokémon must hail from a world where the heavens and the earth are as one, but there is no way of proving it.
cobblemon.species.magearna-original.desc: It functions thanks to its artificial soul. The vivid decoration is proof that it was presented as a gift to royalty.
cobblemon.species.arceus-poison.desc: The rules of time and space change within the opposite world.
cobblemon.species.silvally-poison.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to poison type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.kyogre-primal.desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it takes back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.
cobblemon.species.groudon-primal.desc: Primal Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.
cobblemon.species.arceus-psychic.desc: The Original One breathed alone before the universe came.
cobblemon.species.silvally-psychic.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to psychic type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.urshifu-rapidstrike.de: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in defeating foes by raining many blows down on them. Its strikes are nonstop, flowing like a river.
cobblemon.species.keldeo-resolute.desc: The power that lay hidden in its body now covers its horn, turning it into a sword that can slice through anything.
cobblemon.species.arceus-rock.desc: It gathers power from the Plates, listening for the flute's song.
cobblemon.species.silvally-rock.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to rock type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-shadow.desc: A powerful Mewtwo corrupted by shadow energy. It wields overwhelming psychic force through a dark crystal, fighting with relentless aggression and unstable power.
cobblemon.species.calyrex-shadow.desc: Legend says that by using its power to see all events from past to future, this Pokémon saved the creatures of a forest from a meteorite strike.
cobblemon.species.lugia-shadow.desc: This Lugia has had the door to its heart shut by the criminal syndicate Cipher, believed to be the ultimate Shadow Pokémon and completely immune to purification.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-shadow-mega-y.d: In its Mega Y form, Shadow Mewtwo becomes faster and more unstable. Its psychic energy spirals out of control, distorting reality around it with every devastating strike.
cobblemon.species.mewtwo-shadow-mega-x.d: Amplified by shadow energy and Mega Evolution, this form radiates raw, chaotic power. Its crystal core surges uncontrollably, making it nearly impossible to stop in battle.
cobblemon.species.shaymin-sky.desc: Upon taking in the scent of a particular rare flower, Shaymin is enveloped in light, and its tiny body transforms, conferring the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
cobblemon.species.arceus-steel.desc: That which fills the other side of the world can shape the rage and mold it.
cobblemon.species.silvally-steel.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to steel type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-ultra.desc: Necrozma is at its full power in this form, radiating energy that has all sorts of effects on living beings and even nature itself. It is known as the 'blinding one' due to its brilliant appearance.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-duskmane.desc: This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.
cobblemon.species.necrozma-dawnwings.des: This is its form while it's devouring the light of Lunala. It grasps foes in its giant claws and rips them apart with brute force.
cobblemon.species.hoopa-unbound.desc: In its true form, it possess a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.
cobblemon.species.arceus-water.desc: The rightful bearer of a Plate draws from the Plate it holds.
cobblemon.species.silvally-water.desc: Upon awakening, its RKS System is activated. By employing specific memories, this Pokémon can adapt to water type to confound its enemies.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-wellspring.des: This form excels in both attack and defense. It ceaselessly unleashes moves like a spring gushes water.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-hearthflame.de: This form is the most aggressive, bombarding enemies with the intensity of flames blazing within a hearth.
cobblemon.species.ogerpon-cornerstone.de: This form has excellent defenses, absorbing impacts solidly like the cornerstones that support houses.
cobblemon.species.kyurem-white.desc: The sameness of Reshiram's and Kyurem's genes allowed Kyurem to absorb Reshiram. Kyurem can now use the power of both fire and ice.
cobblemon.species.unown-a.desc: It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly living creatures. I've pointed out that the species' many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.
cobblemon.species.unown-b.desc: It is hard to believe these strangely shaped Pokémon are truly living creatures. I've pointed out that the species' many forms resemble writing from other lands; no one will take me seriously.
